name: states_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool city_and_state_search_api.
Tool description: A easy-to-use API for search cities, states, and countries from around the world.
API description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific states by name. It returns a list of states that match the specified search query. You can also set country code or country name to search states in that country only.

q.description: The search query string representing the name of the state to search for.

limit.description: The maximum number of state results to return. Defaults to '50'.

sortorder.description: The order in which to sort results (e.g., 'asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to None.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort results. Defaults to None.

country_id.description: The ID of the country to filter results by. Defaults to None.

country_code.description: The code of the country to filter results by. Defaults to None.

country_name.description: The name of the country to filter results by. Defaults to None.
